snippet.title: European Conqueror X [Nintendo Switch] Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
In European Conqueror X on Nintendo Switch you engage in turn-based strategy and resource management, taking on battles in the late 18th- and early 19th-Century. You utilise weapons and soldiers distinct to that period in European warfare, making key decisions to turn the tide of war.

You can tackle the Campaign mode that includes various conflicts, try to rule a continent in Conquest or take on Challenges. It's time to prove yourself!
